description: Given a schema with a default set for the 'name' property

tests.description: When the schema is applied to an empty object, the name property should be set to default value
When the schema is applied to an object where 'name' exists, then the property should not change

description: Given a schema with a default set for the required properties only

tests.description: When the schema is applied to an empty object, the properties which are present in the required list must set to default value

When the schema is applied to an object which is already having some properties, the properties which are present in the required list should set to default value without changing the previous properties of the instance
